app.controllers

Class LineManagement

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.controllers.LineManagement

  • public class LineManagement
extends java.lang.Object
    LineManagement controller. Sets detour of specific conflict in line when some street is closed.
    Author:
    Petr Křehlík, Martin Klobušický

      • startUp

             throws java.lang.Exception

        Parameters:
        line - line
        streetMap - streetMap
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - When there is no route available.

      • refreshGui

        private void refreshGui()
        Refresh window GUI. Find last good street. Show available streets to pick.

      • addStreetClick

        public void addStreetClick(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
        Add street to detour list. Test if double click. Add street to newRouteListView. Compute new follow streets in selectStreetListView.
        Parameters:
        mouseEvent -

      • removeStreetClick

        public void removeStreetClick(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
        Remove street from detour list. Test if double click. Remove selected item from newRouteListView. Compute new follow streets in selectStreetListView.
        Parameters:
        mouseEvent -

      • updateTimetableNew

        public void updateTimetableNew(Line line,
                               java.util.List<Street> newStreets,
                               java.util.List<Street> closedStreets)
        Update timetable based on new route with list of closed street.
        Parameters:
        line - Line object.
        newStreets - List of streets that is new route.
        closedStreets - List of closed streets that is in order. (Streets must follows each other)

      • saveAndCloseClick

        public void saveAndCloseClick(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Compute new timetable. Check if all data is correct. Compute conflicts for next use. Close window.
        Parameters:
        mouseEvent -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - When no route is available or route is not valid.

        public boolean findWay(Stop startingStop,
                       Stop endingStop)
        Check if between two stops exists at least one available route.
        Parameters:
        startingStop - First stop.
        endingStop - Second stop.
        Returns:
        Return true if there is at least one not closed route. Otherwise false.
